meanings.definition: A problem or fault in a machine or system.
meanings.sent1: The disfunctions in the engine caused the car to break down.
meanings.sent2: The technician fixed the disfunctions in the computer.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctions in the vending machine made it give out extra snacks.
meanings.sent4: The disfunctions in the clock turned time into a chaotic dance.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctions in the printer created a colorful mess on the paper.

meanings.definition: A failure to work or operate correctly.
meanings.sent1: The disfunctions of the old radio made it play static.
meanings.sent2: The disfunctions of the phone prevented any calls from going through.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctions in the robot dance made it a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: The disfunctions in the plan caused the project to come to a halt.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctions in the toy car made it go in circles endlessly.

meanings.definition: A deviation from the normal functioning of something.
meanings.sent1: The disfunctions in the weather patterns led to unexpected storms.
meanings.sent2: The disfunctions in the body's metabolism can cause health issues.
meanings.sent3: The disfunctions in the traffic lights made everyone drive in circles.
meanings.sent4: The disfunctions in the music system created a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The disfunctions in the plant's growth turned its leaves purple.
